name: JunkHider
description: Hides specific UI elements across various GD menus that aren't worth hiding as standalone Geode mods.

hideLevelSelectJunk.name: Hide Level Select Junk
hideLevelSelectJunk.description:
Hides the dots, ground, and "Download the Soundtrack" text from the main level select menu.
DOES NOT WORK ON MACOS.

hideClearSearch.name: Hide Clear Search
hideClearSearch.description:
Hides the "Clear Search" button from the search bar.
Useful for Android users whose muscle memory hasn't adjusted to 2.2 yet.

hideHeaderSprites.name: Hide Header Sprites
hideHeaderSprites.description: Hides header sprites from the Top Lists and Featured Level menus.

hideDailyWeeklyTime.name: Hide Time from Daily/Weekly Level
hideDailyWeeklyTime.description:
Hides the redundant countdown text for the next daily/weekly level after claiming the daily/weekly level bonus.
REQUIRES GEODE TEAM'S "NODE IDS" MOD TO WORK.

hideNG.name: Hide NG from Main Menu
hideNG.description:
Disclaimer: For Windows users ONLY.
Does not remove this button; only hides it.

hideAchievements.name: Hide Achievements from Main Menu
hideAchievements.description:

hideStats.name: Hide Stats from Main Menu
